channel.title: Client loading cache from a newer version
channel.description: is it possible to make your client load a newer version of everything, such as the GE maps being added, the newer player and clothes etc. without changing your customs?? and how hard would it be to do this if possible? If not is there a way to make your client run on a newer version of a client? i'm using PI source
